verses.verse: For the Chief Musician; set to Al-tashheth. A Psalm of David. Michtam; when he fled from Saul, in the cave. Be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H430><s%>, O God, be merciful <S%H2603><s%> unto me <S%H5315><s%>; For my soul taketh refuge <S%H2620><s%> in thee <S%H6738><s%>: Yea, in the shadow of thy wings <S%H3671><s%> will I take refuge <S%H2620><s%>, Until these calamities <S%H1942><s%> be overpast <S%H5674><s%>.
I will cry <S%H7121><s%> unto God <S%H430><s%> Most High <S%H5945><s%>, Unto God <S%H410><s%> that performeth all things for me <S%H1584><s%>.

He will send <S%H7971><s%> from heaven <S%H8064><s%>, and save <S%H3467><s%> me <S%H7602><s%>, When he that would swallow me up reproacheth <S%H2778><s%>; <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah God <S%H430><s%> will send forth <S%H7971><s%> his lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> and his truth <S%H571><s%>.

My soul <S%H5315><s%> is among <S%H8432><s%> lions <S%H3833><s%>; I lie <S%H7901><s%> among them that are set on fire <S%H3857><s%>, Even the sons <S%H1121><s%> of men <S%H120><s%>, whose teeth <S%H8127><s%> are spears <S%H2595><s%> and arrows <S%H2671><s%>, And their tongue <S%H3956><s%> a sharp <S%H2299><s%> sword <S%H2719><s%>.
Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; Let thy glory <S%H3519><s%> be above all the earth <S%H776><s%>.

They have prepared <S%H3559><s%> a net <S%H7568><s%> for my steps <S%H6471><s%>; My soul <S%H5315><s%> is bowed down <S%H3721><s%>: They have digged <S%H3738><s%> a pit <S%H7882><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H5307><s%>; They are fallen into the midst <S%H8432><s%> thereof themselves <S%H5542><s%>. [[Selah
My heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, my heart <S%H3820><s%> is fixed <S%H3559><s%>: I will sing <S%H7891><s%>, yea <S%H2167><s%>, I will sing praises.
Awake up <S%H5782><s%>, my glory <S%H3519><s%>; Awake <S%H5782><s%>, psaltery <S%H5035><s%> and harp <S%H3658><s%>: I myself will awake <S%H5782><s%> right early <S%H7837><s%>.
I will give thanks <S%H3034><s%> unto thee <S%H136><s%>, O Lord, among the peoples <S%H5971><s%>: I will sing <S%H2167><s%> praises unto thee among the nations <S%H3816><s%>.
For thy lovingkindness <S%H2617><s%> is great <S%H1419><s%> unto the heavens <S%H8064><s%>, And thy truth <S%H571><s%> unto the skies <S%H7834><s%>.
Be thou exalted <S%H7311><s%>, O God <S%H430><s%>, above the heavens <S%H8064><s%>; Let thy glory <S%H3519><s%> be above all the earth <S%H776><s%>.
